body.bibl: Lane, David J. “‘There Is No Need of Turtle-Doves or Young Pigeons ...’ (Jacob of Sarug): Quotations and Non-Quotations of Leviticus in Selected Syriac Writers.” In The Peshitta: Its Use in Literature and Liturgy.
